sentences.sContent: He took a vow of chastity and celibacy.
sentences.sCn: 他发下了守贞和独身的誓。

remMethod.val: chast (看作chaste， 贞节的) + ity (性质) → 贞节， 贞操

words.tran: 纯洁的；贞洁的；有道德的；朴素的

trans.tranCn: 纯洁； 贞节； 简洁
trans.tranOther: the principle or state of not having sex with anyone, or not with anyone except your husband or wife
